name: Stalker_Melee.Fiery_Melee
display_help: Fiery Melee allows you to attack with fire, and even conjure up flaming melee weapons. Fiery Melee powers tend to set foes ablaze for added Damage Over Time.

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Scorch
powers.display_help: This power engulfs your hands in flames, and can ignite the target of your Scorching attack. Once on fire, the target will suffer damage over time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 3 ticks of 80.00% chance for 5.56 fire damage over 1.1s on target after 0.5s delay
7.00% chance for 46.71 fire damage on target
Only if hidden or target placated

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Fire_Sword
powers.display_help: Through concentration, you can create a Sword of Fire that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 5.56 fire damage over 1.6s on target after 0.5s delay
7.00% chance for 73.41 fire damage on target
Only if hidden or target placated

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Cremate
powers.display_help: A slow but devastating attack. Cremate clobbers your foe with a massive 2 handed fiery smash that leaves your foe set on fire. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 4 ticks of 5.56 fire damage over 1.6s on target after 0.5s delay
7.00% chance for 91.20 fire damage on target
Only if hidden or target placated

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Assassins_Blaze
powers.display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior fire damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Blaze when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Placate
powers.display_help: Allows you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit or an Assassins Strike. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 15000.00% stealth radius for 10s on self after 0.25s delay
38000.00% stealth radius for 10s on self after 0.25s delay

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Breath_of_Fire
powers.display_help: This allows you to spew forth fire from your mouth, burning all foes within its narrow cone. This is a very accurate attack that can deal good damage at a close range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 15 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 2 ticks of 37.81 fire damage over 0.6s on target
4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 5.56 fire damage over 1.6s on target after 1s delay
7.00% chance for 60.06 fire damage on target
50.00% chance for 60.06 fire damage on target
Only if hidden or target placated

powers.display_help: Mastery of your Fire Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and burn your enemies, dealing minor damage and setting them ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 5.56 fire damage over 1.6s on target after 0.5s delay
